attributes.action: We the Undersigned  Petition the Prime Minister to Stop  Benifits amounting to £25.000 a Year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Plus  living in a Property Valued at £380.000 that we the British Taxpaper are paying for.
It takes Advantage of our Social Security Benifit system and that is a Liberty.
